QuestData.Title: Arcane Guardians
QuestData.Description:
Those constructs patrolling the creche are not animated by the Earth-Warder's magic.
<Dervishian narrows her eyes.>
We cannot allow there to be enemies in our midst.
Destroy them to clear our path forward.
QuestData.RewardText:
Those constructs were animated with blue dragonflight magic.
The Earth-Warder would never have allowed this!
